headline: Las Vegas Sands Profit, Sales Jump as Macao, Singapore Investments Pay Off
summary: The operator of casinos and resorts reported a profit of $419 million, or 61 cents a share, compared with $275 million, or 38 cents, in the same quarter a year earlier.

headline: Las Vegas Sands: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: LAS VEGAS (AP) — Las Vegas Sands Corp. LVS) on Wednesday reported third-quarter profit of $419 million. On a per-share basis, the Las Vegas-based company said it had net income of 61 cents.

headline: Is Las Vegas Sands Poised for a Rebound After Macau Tourism Surge in 2025?
summary: Trying to figure out what to do with Las Vegas Sands stock? You are not alone. With shares most recently closing around $50.62, investors are watching the tape for hints of the next move. Over just the past week, the stock popped by 5.4%, a clear sign of renewed optimism. Yet, zooming out, things look a bit more complicated: Las Vegas Sands is up only 1.4% for the year so far and has slipped 6.0% over the past month. On the other hand, those who held on for three years have seen a stellar...
